lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.view.gui.monitor

Class MonitorGUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.view.gui.abstractgui.AbstractGUIController
      • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.view.gui.monitor.MonitorGUIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasTables

    public class MonitorGUIController
extends AbstractGUIController
implements HasTables
    The Class MonitorGUIController, which is used to control the GUI of the monitor window. This is a window created for observing data in the server. If there is a difference between the database and what the monitor says, there could be an issue
